article: It was sunny and hot all day. I went to the beach with my friends. We had a lot of fun  swimming  at sea .In the afternoon, we  visited a museum  . There  _  many people in the museum. It was crowded, so I  _  really enjoy it.  On my way  home. I found a little girl  crying  in the street. She  was lost  and I helped her  find  her mother. It made me feel very happy. I didn't any money  _  a taxi, so I walked back home. I was really  _  .
